author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Silke Stertz, stertz.silke@virology.uzh.ch, or Benjamin G. Hale, hale.ben@virology.uzh.ch.

fn.p: Citation Spieler EE, Moritz E, Stertz S, Hale BG. 2020. Application of a biologically contained reporter system to study gain-of-function H5N1 influenza A viruses with pandemic potential. mSphere 5:e00423-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/mSphere.00423-20.
